Antonakos, Cory, Prerequisite: Prerequisite: CHEM-108 or score of 3, 4, or 5 on AP Chemistry Test or appropriate chemistry skill level demonstrated through Chemistry Diagnostic Test or equivalent, Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process or completion of a course taught at or above the level of intermediate algebra. Note: Partially online course with required meetings Wednesdays 11:10AM-12:35PM and Tuesdays and Thursdays 11:10AM-2:15PM (on-campus, see room on schedule) with all other instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas. Class meets on-campus as scheduled.
